languages.text: "Великий дух, покровительствующий нашей палубе, охраняющий ее и наблюдающий за всем, что творится на ней. Когда-то Преф был добрым отцом нам, но затем был обманут коварными людьми и отказал в праве дружбы смертным, живущим здесь. Он распомнил имя каждого, кому прежде покровительствовал, и не узнавал более их лиц. С той поры Преф — суровый и жестокосердный владыка, глухой к нашим молитвам".

"Our deck's great patron spirit, who protects it and watches over everything that happens on it. Pref used to be a kind father to us until wicked people tricked him. That was when he disowned the mortals who lived here. He wiped the names of everyone who used to be under his patronage from his memory and no longer recognised their faces. Since then, Pref has been a harsh and cruel-hearted master who is deaf to our prayers."
languages.original_text: "Великий дух, покровительствующий нашей палубе, охраняющий ее и наблюдающий за всем, что творится на ней. Когда-то Преф был добрым отцом нам, но затем был обманут коварными людьми и отказал в праве дружбы смертным, живущим здесь. Он распомнил имя каждого, кому прежде покровительствовал, и не узнавал более их лиц. С той поры Преф — суровый и жестокосердный владыка, глухой к нашим молитвам".

languages.text: 「私たちのデッキにおわす偉大な守護精霊だ。デッキを守り、そこで起こる万事を見守っている。プレフは私たちに対しては優しい父だったが、悪辣な者どもに騙された。その時、ここに住む人間と縁を切ったのだ。彼はかつて守護していた者たちの名前を記憶から消し去った。もうその顔もわからなくなっている。以来、プレフは厳格で残酷な支配者となり、祈祷に耳を貸すこともない」
languages.original_text: "Our deck's great patron spirit, who protects it and watches over everything that happens on it. Pref used to be a kind father to us until wicked people tricked him. That was when he disowned the mortals who lived here. He wiped the names of everyone who used to be under his patronage from his memory and no longer recognised their faces. Since then, Pref has been a harsh and cruel-hearted master who is deaf to our prayers."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちのデッキにおわす偉大な守護精霊だ。デッキを守り、そこで起こる万事を見守っている。プレフは私たちに対しては優しい父だったが、悪辣な者どもに騙された。その時、ここに住む人間と縁を切ったのだ。彼はかつて守護していた者たちの名前を記憶から消し去った。もうその顔もわからなくなっている。以来、プレフは厳格で残酷な支配者となり、祈祷に耳を貸すこともない」

languages.text: “普雷弗是我们甲板上伟大的守护神。他保护着甲板，监视着甲板上发生的一切。他曾经是我们的慈父，直到邪恶之人蒙蔽了他。他与住在这里的凡人断绝了关系，从记忆中抹去了那些曾在他手下工作过的人的名字，再也认不出他们的脸。从那以后，普雷弗就成了一位冷酷无情的统治者，对我们的祈祷充耳不闻。”
languages.original_text: "Our deck's great patron spirit, who protects it and watches over everything that happens on it. Pref used to be a kind father to us until wicked people tricked him. That was when he disowned the mortals who lived here. He wiped the names of everyone who used to be under his patronage from his memory and no longer recognised their faces. Since then, Pref has been a harsh and cruel-hearted master who is deaf to our prayers."

traits.locale_text: “普雷弗是我们甲板上伟大的守护神。他保护着甲板，监视着甲板上发生的一切。他曾经是我们的慈父，直到邪恶之人蒙蔽了他。他与住在这里的凡人断绝了关系，从记忆中抹去了那些曾在他手下工作过的人的名字，再也认不出他们的脸。从那以后，普雷弗就成了一位冷酷无情的统治者，对我们的祈祷充耳不闻。”

languages.text: « L'esprit protecteur qui veille sur notre pont. Pref était comme un père bienveillant pour nous, jusqu'à ce que des esprits malveillants ne l'amènent à renier les mortels qui vivent ici et qu'il n'efface les noms et les visages de ses fidèles de sa propre mémoire. Depuis, il est sourd à nos prières et nous traite avec autant de sévérité que de cruauté. »
languages.original_text: "Our deck's great patron spirit, who protects it and watches over everything that happens on it. Pref used to be a kind father to us until wicked people tricked him. That was when he disowned the mortals who lived here. He wiped the names of everyone who used to be under his patronage from his memory and no longer recognised their faces. Since then, Pref has been a harsh and cruel-hearted master who is deaf to our prayers."

traits.locale_text: « L'esprit protecteur qui veille sur notre pont. Pref était comme un père bienveillant pour nous, jusqu'à ce que des esprits malveillants ne l'amènent à renier les mortels qui vivent ici et qu'il n'efface les noms et les visages de ses fidèles de sa propre mémoire. Depuis, il est sourd à nos prières et nous traite avec autant de sévérité que de cruauté. »

languages.text: «El gran espíritu patrón que protege nuestra cubierta y vigila todo lo que sucede en ella. Pref solía actuar como una bondadosa figura paternal para todos nosotros hasta que unos individuos desalmados lo engañaron. Fue entonces cuando renegó de los mortales que vivían aquí. Borró de su memoria los nombres de todos los que cuidaba y ya no reconocía sus caras. Desde entonces, Pref ha sido un maestro duro y cruel que no escucha nuestras plegarias».
languages.original_text: "Our deck's great patron spirit, who protects it and watches over everything that happens on it. Pref used to be a kind father to us until wicked people tricked him. That was when he disowned the mortals who lived here. He wiped the names of everyone who used to be under his patronage from his memory and no longer recognised their faces. Since then, Pref has been a harsh and cruel-hearted master who is deaf to our prayers."

traits.locale_text: «El gran espíritu patrón que protege nuestra cubierta y vigila todo lo que sucede en ella. Pref solía actuar como una bondadosa figura paternal para todos nosotros hasta que unos individuos desalmados lo engañaron. Fue entonces cuando renegó de los mortales que viven aquí. Borró de su memoria los nombres de todos los que cuidaba y ya no reconocía sus caras. Desde entonces, Pref ha sido un maestro duro y cruel que no escucha nuestras plegarias».

languages.text: "Der große Schutzgeist unseres Decks, der es beschützt und über alles wacht, was darauf geschieht. Präf war uns früher ein gütiger Vater, bis böse Leute ihn hereingelegt haben. Da hat er die Sterblichen enteignet, die hier leben. Er hat aus seinem Gedächtnis die Namen aller gelöscht, die früher unter seinem Schutz standen, und erkennt ihre Gesichter nicht mehr. Seitdem ist Präf ein strenger und grausamer Meister, der unsere Gebete nicht erhört."
languages.original_text: "Our deck's great patron spirit, who protects it and watches over everything that happens on it. Pref used to be a kind father to us until wicked people tricked him. That was when he disowned the mortals who lived here. He wiped the names of everyone who used to be under his patronage from his memory and no longer recognised their faces. Since then, Pref has been a harsh and cruel-hearted master who is deaf to our prayers."

traits.locale_text: "Der große Schutzgeist unseres Decks, der es beschützt und über alles wacht, was darauf geschieht. Präf war uns früher ein gütiger Vater, bis böse Leute ihn hereingelegt haben. Da hat er die Sterblichen enteignet, die hier leben. Er hat aus seinem Gedächtnis die Namen aller gelöscht, die früher unter seinem Schutz standen, und erkennt ihre Gesichter nicht mehr. Seitdem ist Präf ein strenger und grausamer Meister, der unsere Gebete nicht erhört."

languages.text: "Güvertemizin ulu hami ruhu. Onu korur ve ona olan her şeyi gözlemler. Pref eskiden bizim için nazik bir babaydı ancak daha sonra kötü kişiler onu kandırdı. Ardından burada yaşayan ölümlüleri evlatlıktan reddetti. Eskiden onun hâkimiyetinde yaşayan herkesin ismini hafızasından sildi ve artık yüzlerini tanımıyor. O günden beri Pref, dualarımıza kulak vermeyen, zorlu ve zalim bir efendi hâline geldi."
languages.original_text: "Our deck's great patron spirit, who protects it and watches over everything that happens on it. Pref used to be a kind father to us until wicked people tricked him. That was when he disowned the mortals who lived here. He wiped the names of everyone who used to be under his patronage from his memory and no longer recognised their faces. Since then, Pref has been a harsh and cruel-hearted master who is deaf to our prayers."
